casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Joseph CARVALHO, II. No. 369A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 18, 2016. Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Carvalho, John Joseph (II). Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Trey Robison, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 17th of May 2016 by State of NC

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of May 2016."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 31st day of May 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
